availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: William K. Walker (Edmonson County, Kentucky, farmer and horse dealer)

body.p: Edmonson County, Kentucky, farmer and horse dealer. Kentucky native. Son of John Walker and Margaret Walker. Farm laborer in Brownsville, Kentucky, in 1860. Horse dealer in Edmonson County in 1864.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Edmonson County, Brownsville, p. 101.
Records of the Internal Revenue Service, NARA RG 58, Series M768, Roll 02, p. 428 /549 on microfilm (accessed via Ancestry.com).
